Header: Restricted Rajagiriya traffic movement results in spillover congestion
Content: Police Media Spokesperson, SP Ruwan Gunesekera, said the move has resulted in heavy congestion in the area, for traffic that moves back and forth during rush hours. Police notes that this situation may continue till next week Police have instructed motorists who travel from Battaramulla, Malabe, Thalawathugoda, Thalangama, Athurugiriya to Colombo to use alternative routes. A News1st correspondent said that even though there are alternative routes, there remains an issue of those roads being congested as well.
